Element.name: ContextParameter
Element.Description: A Context Parameter is an application-level variable used to store values during a user's session or for the entire duration of the application.

PropertyCategory.name: General
PropertyCategory.Property:
The type of the value stored in the parameter, if the context. Admissible types are:
  • String
  • Password
  • Text
  • Integer
  • Decimal
  • Float
  • Date
  • Entity
  • Time
  • Timestamp
  • Boolean
  • URL
  • Blob
If the selected type is Entity, the parameter is defined over a class.
It is used when the parameter holds the oid of an class instance (e.g., the predefined context parameters UserCtxParam and GroupCtxParam).
If checked, the session parameter are held by the URL.
Specifies the Cookie Storage Provide used to save parameter'value using client side cookies.
